title: MRP Baxter gravel suspension fork adds travel, bigger tires & bikepacking mounts
content:
The all-new MRP Baxter gravel bike fork is lighter, longer, and more capable than ever. Now with options for 40mm or 60mm of gravel-tuned travel and up to 50mm/2″ tire clearance, adventure riders of all sorts can tame more terrain and extend their bikepacking range with new cage mounts on each fork leg… All-new MRP […]

The post MRP Baxter gravel suspension fork adds travel, bigger tires & bikepacking mounts appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
